title: 14704 E 2nd Ave #E110 - Aurora - 5 min to Town Center of Aurora!
posting_body: This unit comes with laminate floors throughout the entire unit, a fireplace (decorative, cannot be used by tenants), and French doors inside the bedroom that lead to the outside patio area.
**Per the HOA: Satellite dishes MUST be within the airspace of your deck or patio.
Satellite dishes outside of those boundaries will be removed.
All grills (gas, charcoal, and wood-burning) and smokers are prohibited from being used at this complex.
INCLUDED UTILITIES: Water and trash removal!
All other utilities not above paid by tenant.
Dishwasher, garbage disposal, refrigerator, microwave, stove, oven.
FLOORING: Laminate flooring throughout the entire unit!
HEAT/COOLING: Window AC unit with baseboard heating.
PETS: Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.
LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June 2023.
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
